title: Tech sans on "Area" book cover (Phaidon Press)
content:
Hi, anyone knows the face being used in this book, Area by Phaidon Press.  
It´s the one in the upper right corner I´m looking for. Sorry for the lousy image.
author: Toby

comments.content:
If you take a look at the book you'll find it in there. Just look carefully, It's a big book but I belive there's no type specimens besides that particular section.  
I can't remember the name right now, but i'm sure you'll find it in there. Although the cover lettering it's a outlined version of it.  
I'll check that out later this evening.

;)

See [this older thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20120515174343/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13185). Next time, please [run a search](http://web.archive.org/web/20120515174343/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20area%20phaidon) first. Thanks,  
F
Thanks, but that thread doesn´t solve it really..

@ Toby: Yeah, I know. Just wanted to point you there, as a) there _is some_ information at least and b) you could have bumped that thread instead of starting a new one. Nevermind. :-)  
Here’s a sample that might help finding it:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120515174343im_/http:/typophile.com/files/area_5612.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120515174343im_/http:/typophile.com/files/area-2_4573.png)
Thanks, I think I got it now. Seems it´s Typ 1461, by Nico Schweizer, New York
Yes you're right, I've just confirmed that is indeed "Typ 1461" designed by Nico Schweizer for mediadub.com, New York.
